reviewText: Great music from the REAL underground....a nice companion to RW II

I loved the Romantic Warriors II DVD on the origin and current state of Rock in Opposition. In the course of making that documentary the filmmakers Adele Schmidt and Jose Zegarra Holder collected more concert footage and interviews than they could use. Their solution, and it's a good one, was to release this 'companion DVD' as an adjunct. The concert footage here, taken from several different venues over the past few years, is really excellent quality -- although at only one song per band I would have gladly sat through more. The interviews are not lengthy either, and mostly self-explanatory as to why they were left on the cutting room floor. The DVD is in a cardboard sleeve with minimal packaging, no pictures and very little data. It was a good idea to give us "more music and more interviews" but I could wish for the whole concerts these songs came from!
